metadata.description: ICDEV.pl is a creative web studio specializing in creating modern, functional, and aesthetic websites for companies from Poland and Ukraine. We offer a wide range of services, including landing page design, online stores, CRM systems, SEO, advertising, and technical support. With an individual approach to each project and the use of modern technologies, ICDEV.pl helps clients achieve their goals and succeed in the digital world.

greeting.h1: We create websites that inspire and sell
greeting.h4: Modern websites that sell – with full support and advertising.

items.title: Landing Page Design
items.description: We create modern and functional websites tailored to your needs.

items.title: Advanced Websites
items.description: Online stores, CRM systems, and other solutions for your business.

items.title: Technical Support
items.description: Ongoing assistance in maintaining and updating websites.

items.title: Memorial Website
items.description: “Heavenly Legion of Volyn” is a research and memorial project commemorating the residents of Volyn who died in the war with Russia.

items.title: Online Store for Small Business
items.description: “Everything for Everyone” is a Ukrainian company with many years of trade experience based in Lutsk.
